labelle.name: LaBelle
labelle.description: Beautiful new homes in the heart of LaBelle, Florida

about.title: About LaBelle
about.description: LaBelle is a charming community in Southwest Florida, perfect for families looking for a peaceful lifestyle with easy access to major cities. Our new construction homes in LaBelle offer modern amenities, spacious lots, and exceptional value.
about.fullDescription: The city of LaBelle is located in a region with exuberant forests and wildlife, immersed in oak trees that characterize its landscape and provide shade to its land. With the oak tree being a species that still remains an insignia in the region, it continues to inhabit most residential developments throughout the area. The city of LaBelle is the main urban conglomerate in the region today and preserves an important historical center with buildings constructed at the end of the 19th century and the beginning of the 20th century. LaBelle continues to contribute to the conservation of the rich architectural heritage in Florida. While cultivating its history, it proudly welcomes the urbanization of its developing areas.

fishing.description: Enjoy freshwater fishing in the beautiful waters of LaBelle

outdoor walks.title: Outdoor Walks
outdoor walks.description: Explore nature trails surrounded by oak trees

lehighAcres.name: Lehigh Acres
lehighAcres.description: Modern homes in growing Lehigh Acres community

about.title: About Lehigh Acres
about.description: Lehigh Acres is a growing community in Southwest Florida, offering affordable living with great amenities. Our new construction homes in Lehigh Acres feature modern designs, spacious layouts, and our innovative Rent to Own program with 5 years of rent stability.
about.fullDescription: Lehigh Acres is situated on one of the most elevated areas of land in Lee County, between 27 and 30 feet above sea level. In this community, residents can enjoy freshwater fishing year-round, world-class golf courses, tennis, bicycling, nature trails, and numerous other activities at various clubs and organizations. As one of the fastest growing cities in the state of Florida, Lehigh Acres has nearly doubled in new home construction within the last 24 months. It is located only 15 minutes east of Cape Coral, 12 miles (19 kilometers) east of Fort Myers, and is equidistant to 3 major cities: Miami, Orlando and Tampa. Lehigh Acres offers beautiful lakes and is approximately 35 minutes away from a few of Florida's most breathtaking beaches, including Bonita Beach, Fort Myers Beach, and the Islands of Sanibel and Captiva.

louisiana.name: Louisiana
louisiana.description: Spacious family home with modern amenities
louisiana.fullDescription: The Louisiana model offers 4 grand bedrooms and 3 full bathrooms. This statuesque home spans 3,277 sq/ft of meticulously designed flow space to satisfy the needs of the most discerning of clients. Light placement and vaulted ceilings have been engineered and thought through at the highest level to provide an energy efficient yet luxurious level of comfort to this estate. The kitchen space was designed with your family in mind, prepare to fall in love with our high end finishes! Feel the quality of the stone countertops, enjoy the smooth feeling of the soft close cabinetry. Let your eyes enjoy the sleek design of our all stainless modern appliances.
features: Modern kitchen with stainless steel appliances

viana.name: Viana
viana.description: Elegant design perfect for growing families
viana.fullDescription: With 4 bedrooms and 3 full bathrooms, it spans over 2,978 square feet. Prepare to fall in love. Its open concept offers a spacious living area, complemented by vaulted ceilings and ample lighting, complete with a modern kitchen design that includes: custom cabinets, granite countertops and energy-efficient stainless-steel appliances.

delanie.name: Delanie
delanie.description: Contemporary style with open floor plans
delanie.fullDescription: This spectacular home offers a multitude of benefits for you and your family. Its special features and remarkable price will exceed your expectations. The Delanie is one of our most sophisticated models. With 3 bedrooms, 1 den/4th bedroom optional, and 2 full bathrooms, it spans over 2,610 square feet. Prepare to fall in love with the Delanie. Its special features include an open concept floor plan, spacious living area, vaulted ceilings, ample lighting, custom cabinets, granite countertops, and energy-efficient stainless-steel appliances. The Delanie model is a stunning family home with a diverse, spacious and modern design.

aurora.name: Aurora
aurora.description: Luxury features in an affordable package
aurora.fullDescription: This spectacular home offers a multitude of benefits for you and your family. Its special features and remarkable price will exceed your expectations. The Aurora is one of our most sophisticated models. With 4 bedrooms and 3 full bathrooms, it spans over 2,227 square feet. Prepare to fall in love with the Aurora. Its special features include an open concept floor plan, spacious living area, vaulted ceilings, ample lighting, custom cabinets, granite countertops, and energy-efficient stainless-steel appliances. The Aurora model is a stunning family home with a diverse, spacious and modern design.

langdon.name: Langdon
langdon.fullDescription: This spectacular home offers a multitude of benefits for you and your family. Its special features and remarkable price will exceed your expectations. The Langdon model is one of our most elegant models. With 3 bedrooms and 2 full bathrooms, it spans over 1,900 square feet. Prepare to fall in love with the Langdon. Its special features include an open concept floor plan, spacious living area, vaulted ceilings, ample lighting, custom cabinets, granite countertops, and energy-efficient stainless-steel appliances. The Langdon model is a lovely family home with a diverse and modern design.

emelia.name: Emelia
emelia.description: Our largest model with luxury throughout
emelia.fullDescription: This spectacular home offers a multitude of benefits for you and your family. Its special features and remarkable price will exceed your expectations. The Emelia model is one of our most spacious models. With 3 bedrooms and 2 full bathrooms, it spans over 2,060 square feet. Prepare to fall in love with the Emelia. Its special features include an open concept floor plan, spacious living area, vaulted ceilings, ample lighting, custom cabinets, granite countertops, and energy-efficient stainless-steel appliances. The Emelia model is a lovely family home with a diverse and spacious design.

duplex.name: Duplex
duplex.description: Perfect investment opportunity - live in one unit, rent the other
duplex.fullDescription: Discover the Duplex model, a stunning property featuring two independent units, perfect for living in one and renting the other. Each unit includes 3 bedrooms, 2 bathrooms, and a private garage. With its modern design, bright open spaces, and high-end finishes, this duplex is an ideal investment that combines comfort, style, and profitability.

howItWorks.title: How It Works

1.title: Get Pre-Approved
1.description: Start by getting pre-approved for financing. Understand your budget and show sellers you're serious.

testimonials.title: What Our Families Say
testimonials.subtitle: Real stories from real families who found their dream home with us

1.name: Sarah & Michael Johnson
1.text: M.J. Newell Homes made our dream come true. The Rent to Own program allowed us to move into our beautiful home with $0 down. The quality is exceptional and the process was smooth from start to finish.

2.name: Roberto & Maria Garcia
2.text: We couldn't be happier with our new home! The 1/4 acre lot gives our kids plenty of space to play, and no HOA fees means we save money every month. Highly recommend M.J. Newell Homes!

3.name: David & Jennifer Smith
3.text: The team at M.J. Newell Homes was professional, responsive, and truly cared about our family's needs. Our new home exceeded all expectations. Thank you for making homeownership possible for us!

4.name: Carlos & Ana Rodriguez
4.text: Amazing experience from day one! The build quality is outstanding and the customer service is top-notch. We love our new home and the community. M.J. Newell Homes truly delivers on their promises.

5.name: James & Lisa Thompson
5.text: Best decision we ever made! The Rent to Own program was perfect for our situation. The home is beautiful, spacious, and exactly what we needed. Thank you M.J. Newell Homes for making our dream a reality!

6.name: Miguel & Carmen Martinez
6.text: We are so grateful to M.J. Newell Homes. The entire process was transparent and stress-free. Our new home is perfect for our growing family. The quality and attention to detail exceeded our expectations!

hero.title: About Us
hero.description: Building American Homes in South Florida with a Win-Win Approach

buildingsCompleted.label: Buildings Completed
buildingsCompleted.description: Across Florida by Standard Land Development

leadership.title: Michael J. Newell
leadership.subtitle: Founder & CEO of Standard Land Development and M.J. Newell Homes
leadership.description: Michael J. Newell applies a "Win-Win" approach to business, creating affordable housing for everyday Americans. He has applied a "team mentality" strategy at both Standard Land Development and M.J. Newell Homes, resulting in enormous growth within a 5-year period.
leadership.quote: "The power of a team is crucial. You must recruit individuals who are both strong and trustworthy. I knew in order to be successful, I'd have to enlist first-line powerhouses."
leadership.belief: Michael strongly believes that managing a business means getting to know your employees and cultivating a culture of respect and appreciation. He has diligently invested hundreds of hours with each team member to achieve multi-linear success throughout the organization.

mission.title: Our Mission
mission.text: "We want to make prime-value homes available at an economical rate to all Americans. We believe that affordable housing should be no more than a quarter of their income."

vision.title: Vision for 2023
vision.text: By 2023, M.J. Newell Homes will build 1,200+ units per year. Standard Land Development will continue to develop sites statewide.

values.title: Our Core Values
values.subtitle: The principles that guide everything we do

teamMentality.title: Team Mentality
teamMentality.description: We believe in harnessing each team member's individual strengths to achieve multi-linear success throughout the organization.

winWin.title: Win-Win Approach
winWin.description: We look for win-win solutions in business and help each other along the way, creating positive domino effects for millions of Americans.

affordableHousing.title: Affordable Housing
affordableHousing.description: We believe affordable housing should be no more than 25% of monthly income, ensuring families can live comfortably.

ethicalBusiness.title: Ethical Business
ethicalBusiness.description: Founded on ethical business and social principles, we provide comprehensive support from beginning to end.

companies.title: Our Companies
companies.subtitle: Two complementary businesses working together to build communities

sld.name: Standard Land Development
sld.description: Standard Land Development establishes communities all throughout Florida. SLD's process is to develop the plot of land by building the roads, installing sewer systems, electricity and other infrastructure as needed before erecting the development of homes or industrial buildings.
sld.achievement3: Statewide residential, commercial, and industrial projects

mjNewell.name: M.J. Newell Homes
mjNewell.description: M.J. Newell Homes provides both the sale and customer service of all homes built by Standard Land Development. The customer may purchase from 6 different model home options or custom build their dream abode directly through M.J. Newell Homes.
mjNewell.achievement1: Over 600 residential dwellings built to date

achievements.title: Our Achievements
achievements.subtitle: Building success one home at a time

fiveYears.title: 5 Years of Growth
fiveYears.description: Both Standard Land Development and M.J. Newell Homes have experienced enormous growth within a 5-year period.

homesThisYear.title: 490 Homes This Year
homesThisYear.description: Expected to complete 490 single-family homes this year alone.

statewide.title: Statewide Development
statewide.description: Standard Land Development establishes communities all throughout Florida with complete infrastructure.

sixModels.title: 6 Model Options
sixModels.description: Customers can choose from 6 different model home options or custom build their dream home.

housingCrisis.title: Solving the Affordable Housing Crisis
housingCrisis.description: Like most Americans, Michael Newell has watched the housing crisis continue to grow in the United States. As a result, he has strategically employed both of his businesses to help solve our country's predicament.

learnToBuild.title: Learn to Build Course
learnToBuild.description: Michael Newell has created a course called "Learn to Build," in which he details every building process step. He believes that by sharing his construction knowledge with others, this can ultimately impact the housing deficit in our nation.
learnToBuild.quote: "I feel that a new builder who comes into this industry will only strengthen the market. Our country needs good builders who can supply the growing demand for new construction."

commitment.title: Our Commitment
commitment.text: "The advantages of business transparency has a positive domino-effect not just for me and my team, but for millions of other Americans. In a world where most people attempt to suppress others to gain power for themselves, we believe it's a detriment to society if we don't look for a win-win solution in business and help each other along the way."

team.description: Every family has their own path towards their dream. Agents with the most experience prepare every day to provide you with the most accurate support.

cta.title: Ready to Find Your Dream Home?

hero.title: Rent to Own
hero.subtitle: Live in your new home while saving for your future purchase

whatIs.title: What is Rent to Own?
whatIs.description: The Rent to Own (RTO) program allows you to live in a new home right away while a portion of your monthly rent accumulates as savings for your future purchase. We are not a traditional rental. You pay to live in your new home. Part of that monthly payment becomes savings. At the end of your plan, you can use that savings as a down payment or part of the initial payment for your home.

objective.title: Program Objective
objective.description: Help families save while living in a new home, accumulating funds that they can later use as part of the down payment for their future purchase.

keyFeatures.title: Key Program Features
keyFeatures.subtitle: Benefits designed to help you achieve your dream of homeownership

minimumRent.title: Minimum Rent
minimumRent.description: $2,500 USD monthly (Emelia model). The price may vary depending on the model and location.

monthlySavings.title: Monthly Savings
monthlySavings.description: Between $300 and $1,000 USD depending on the plan chosen for your future purchase.

frozenPrices.title: Frozen Prices
frozenPrices.description: Payments and prices frozen for up to 5 years.

noCreditCheck.title: No Credit Check
noCreditCheck.description: No credit or employment verification required.

easyEntry.title: Easy Entry
easyEntry.description: Move in with just one month!

savingsPlans.title: Savings Plans
savingsPlans.subtitle: Choose the plan that best fits your needs and goals

plan1.description: Ideal for those planning to buy soon

plan3.description: Flexible option for families preparing to buy

plan4.description: Long-term savings plan with greater stability

availableModels.title: Available Models for Rent to Own
availableModels.subtitle: Any model can be Rent to Own. Choose the one that best fits your family

requirements.title: Application Requirements
requirements.subtitle: Simple and accessible requirements to qualify

minimumIncome.title: Minimum Income
minimumIncome.description: Family or individual income of at least $6,000 USD monthly. Remember that you can calculate your income with your bank statements (bank account statements), cash, and commercial references.

immigrationStatus.title: Immigration Status
immigrationStatus.description: Be a citizen, resident, have a valid work permit, or have an ITIN.

process.title: Application Process
process.subtitle: Simple steps to begin your path to homeownership

step1.title: Submit Documents
step1.description: Submit the required documents to begin your application.

step2.title: Complete Application
step2.description: Complete the RTO application ($50 per applicant).

step3.title: Interview and Review
step3.description: Interview and document review by our team.

step4.title: Sign Contract
step4.description: Sign the contract and pay the deposit.

noCreditCheck.description: No credit or employment verification required
